title.rendered: Sold Out – Lashes – Lash in the city

content.rendered:
To Apply: Begin with full makeup in place. Lashes come last!
Remove lashes from tray and fit to natural lash line.
Trim excess band from outer corner.
Apply KOJI Lash glue along entire band and wait 20 seconds for glue to become tacky.
Apply lash band to natural lash line using fingers or applicator using light pressure.

To Remove: Use cotton swab dipped in makeup remover to dissolve glue along lash band. Gently pull off lashes by band. Store lashes in original case after use.

Important note: Be sure to handle them with care when removing them from their tray.

excerpt.rendered:
J BEAUTY Lash in The City is an ideal tray for anyone looking to achieve a lighter yet an elegant look, these multilayered, tapered lashes are sure to effortlessly display your natural charm, grace and style.

Lash in the City comes in 3 designs 4 pair each
Total of 12pairs per tray

4 x C07
4 X C09
4 X C10
